casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Eric Glenn LANE. No. 606A05-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lane, Eric Glenn. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC. Nicholaos Vlahos, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 30th of December 2015 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
